title: PBE Bug???
body: Hi guys recently I am joined to the pbe and i was wondering why I don't have the 99999999 rp/be can someone explain to me i am new to pbe

so um are the stuff in the store going to cost the same amount as in normal servers now?
it used to be only like 1 BE for a champion but now its the same amount of be as it would be lp in normal servers
